title: Settings
subtitle: Manage your account settings and application configuration.

admin.title: Administrator Settings
admin.subtitle: Configure system-wide settings for the application.
admin.unsavedChangesConfirm: You have unsaved changes. Do you want to switch anyway?

general.supportEmailDescription: Email address for support requests (displayed in footer)
general.sessionTimeoutDescription: Time in minutes until automatic logout (1-1440)
general.warningTimeDescription: Minutes before timeout to show warning (1-60)

validation.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
validation.sessionTimeoutRange: Session timeout must be between 1 and 1440 minutes
validation.warningTimeRange: Warning time must be between 1 and 60 minutes
validation.warningTimeLessThanTimeout: Warning time must be less than session timeout

security.title: Login Security
security.maxLoginAttemptsDescription: Number of failed attempts until account lockout (1-100)
security.inactivityTimeoutDescription: Time in minutes until automatic logout due to inactivity (1-1440)
security.passwordMinLengthDescription: Minimum number of characters for passwords (6-128)
security.requireUppercaseDescription: At least one uppercase letter (A-Z) required
security.requireLowercaseDescription: At least one lowercase letter (a-z) required
security.requireSpecialCharsDescription: At least one special character (!@#$%^&*...) required
security.resetConfirmMessage: All security settings will be reset to default values. This action cannot be undone.
security.resetSuccess: Security settings have been reset to default values

validation.maxLoginAttemptsRange: Maximum login attempts must be between 1 and 100
validation.passwordMinLengthRange: Minimum password length must be between 6 and 128
validation.inactivityTimeoutRange: Inactivity timeout must be between 1 and 1440 minutes

email.infoBanner: These settings affect all emails sent by the system such as notifications, password reset emails, and registration confirmations.
email.signatureDescription: Signature appended to the end of every email (max. 1000 characters)

validation.signatureMaxLength: Signature must be at most 1000 characters

maintenance.title: Maintenance Mode
maintenance.description: Temporarily disable the application for all users (except administrators).
maintenance.statusActiveDescription: Normal users cannot access the application.
maintenance.toggleEnableHint: Click to put the application into maintenance mode
maintenance.toggleDisableHint: Click to make the application available again

infoItems.adminAccess: Administrators can still access the application during maintenance mode
infoItems.apiError: All API requests from normal users will be rejected with a 503 error
infoItems.userMessage: Users will see a maintenance page with your message
infoItems.canDisable: Maintenance mode can be disabled at any time

maintenance.enableSuccess: Maintenance mode enabled! Normal users no longer have access.
maintenance.disableSuccess: Maintenance mode disabled. The application is available again.

mfa.title: Two-Factor Authentication (2FA)
mfa.description: Add an extra layer of security to your account.

mfaSetup.title: Two-Factor Authentication
mfaSetup.subtitle: Protect your account with an additional security factor.

intro.title: Enable 2FA
intro.description: Two-factor authentication adds an extra layer of security to your account. In addition to your password, you will need to enter a code from an authenticator app.

benefits.title: Benefits:
benefits.security: Even if your password is compromised, your account remains secure

scan.title: Scan QR Code
scan.description: Scan the QR code with your authenticator app (e.g., Google Authenticator, Authy, Microsoft Authenticator).

verify.title: Enter Verification Code
verify.description: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app.

backup.title: Save Backup Codes
backup.description: Save these backup codes in a safe place. You can use them to access your account if you lose access to your authenticator app.
backup.warning: Each code can only be used once.

success.title: 2FA Enabled!
success.description: Your account is now protected with two-factor authentication.
success.warning: Important: Keep your backup codes safe. You will need them if you lose access to your authenticator app.

errors.setup: Failed to setup 2FA. Please try again.
errors.generic: An error occurred. Please try again.
